long_description: Ortlieb Velocity is a messenger-style waterproof daypack featuring a comfortable foam-padded back. Features comfortable padded shoulder straps, sternum strap and a wide waist strap to ensure a secure fit. Roll-top with rip-and-stick closure offers fast access and easy loading. Removable inner pocket holds keys, change and cell phone and doubles as a strap-on waist pack with your own belt; fits a 1in. wide belt or webbing strap. Reflective detailing on front and back increases your visibility. Convenient carrying handle. Compatible belt or strap is not included.
short_description: Ortlieb Velocity is a messenger-style waterproof daypack featuring a comfortable foam-padded back.
